title: Unable to Launch game
body:
Ok , so i havent been able to , from a while now, play the game . Here's whats happening , I open my launcher and when I click 'LAUNCH' the game , it crashes and displays "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again" , so I did as it said and re-installed , but I still end up with the same result. Now furthermore when I am on the client , and it gives a pop up message to upgrade to the new beta version of the client , I click 'upgrade now' and then it goes back to normal client and no updating takes place , plus for some reason my client isn't updating to 6.24 , usually it would start the update but now it doesn't.
PLEASE HELP ASAP!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing these issues?

Have you tried [completely reinstalling league of legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
